name: conversation_topics
description: All possible conversation topics. One button per topic is on the About page. Each topic has automatic questions associated with it.

data.en: Introducing Yourself
data.cy: Cyflwyno'ch Hun

data.en: Family
data.cy: Teulu

data.en: Hobbies & Free Time
data.cy: Hobïau ac Amser Rhydd

data.en: Daily Routine
data.cy: Trefn Ddyddiol

data.en: Weather
data.cy: Tywydd

data.en: Food & Drink
data.cy: Bwyd a Diod

data.en: Colours
data.cy: Lliwiau

data.en: Clothes
data.cy: Dillad

data.en: Numbers
data.cy: Rhifau

data.en: Places in Town
data.cy: Llefydd yn y dre

data.en: Countries & Travel
data.cy: Gwledydd a Theithio

name: topic_questions
description: Automatically generated questions to start a conversation, matching up to each of the topics in conversation_topics.

data.cy: Beth dych chi'n wisgo heddiw?
data.en: What are you wearing today?

data.cy: Pa ddillad dych chi'n wisgo yn y gaeaf?
data.en: What clothes do you wear in winter?

data.cy: Ydych chi'n hoffi dillad syml neu fwy lliwgar neu gymhleth?
data.en: Do you like simple clothes or ones that are more colourful or complex?

data.cy: Beth yw eich barn chi am esgidiau â sodlau uchel?
data.en: What is your opinion on high-heeled shoes?

data.cy: Pa fath o esgidiau wyt ti’n hoffi?
data.en: What kind of shoes do you like?

data.cy: Wyt ti'n hoffi siopa am ddillad?
data.en: Do you like shopping for clothes?

data.cy: Ydych chi'n gwisgo unrhywbeth arbennig heddiw?
data.en: Are you wearing anything special today?

data.cy: Beth dych chi'n wisgo i'r gwaith?
data.en: What do you wear to work?

data.cy: Oes well gyda chi dillad ffurfiol neu anffurfiol?
data.en: Do you prefer formal or informal clothes?

data.cy: Oes hoff ddarn o ddillad gennych chi?
data.en: Do you have a favourite item of clothing?

data.cy: Ydych chi'n siopa am ddillad ar-lein o gwbl?
data.en: Do you ever shop for clothes online?

data.cy: Beth yw eich barn chi am fenig?
data.en: What's your opinion on gloves?

data.cy: Beth yw eich barn chi am brynu dillad ail-law?
data.en: What's your opinion on buying second-hand clothes?

data.cy: Ydych chi’n gwisgo dillad lliwgar?
data.en: Do you wear colourful clothes?

data.cy: Pa liw yw eich hoff liw?
data.en: What colour is your favourite colour?

data.cy: Oes well gyda chi lliwiau llachar neu dywyll?
data.en: Do you prefer bright or dark colours?

data.cy: Pa liw yw eich llygaid?
data.en: What colour are your eyes?

data.cy: Oes yna liw nad ydych chi'n ei hoffi?
data.en: Is there a colour you don't like?

data.cy: Pa liw yw'r awyr heddiw?
data.en: What colour is the sky today?

data.cy: Beth oedd lliw eich ystafell gwely pan oeddech chi'n ifanc?
data.en: What colour was your bedroom when you were younger?

data.cy: Pa liw yw eich gwallt?
data.en: What colour is your hair?

data.cy: Pa liw dillad dych chi'n gwisgo heddiw?
data.en: What colour clothes are you wearing today?

data.cy: Oes well gyda chi ystafelloedd lliwgar neu syml?
data.en: Do you prefer colourful or simple rooms/interiors?

data.cy: Pa liw yw eich tŷ?
data.en: What colour is your house?

data.cy: Pa liw blodau dych chi'n hoffi?
data.en: What colour flowers do you like?

data.cy: Ydych chi'n meddwl bod lliwiau'n bwysig?
data.en: Do you think colours are important?

data.cy: Pa wlad wyt ti eisiau ymweld â hi?
data.en: Which country do you want to visit?

data.cy: Pa wlad ydych chi wedi ymweld â hi y mwyaf?
data.en: Which country have you visited the most?

data.cy: Beth yw'r pellaf dych chi wedi teithio?
data.en: What's the furthest you have travelled?

data.cy: Beth yw eich hoff beth am deithio i wlad dramor?
data.en: What's your favourite thing about travelling to a foreign country?

data.cy: Dych chi'n hoffi teithio ar eich pen eich hun?
data.en: Do you like travelling alone?

data.cy: Dych chi wedi bod i Ffrainc?
data.en: Have you been to France?

data.cy: O ba wlad dych chi'n dod?
data.en: What country do you come from?

data.cy: Dych chi wedi byw mewn gwlad arall?
data.en: Have you lived in another country?

data.cy: Pa wlad yw eich ffefryn?
data.en: What country is your favourite?

data.cy: Ble aethoch chi ar eich gwyliau diwethaf?
data.en: Where did you go on your last holiday?

data.cy: Dych chi'n siarad ieithoedd eraill?
data.en: Do you speak other languages?

data.cy: Beth yw'r anfanteision o deithio yn eich barn chi?
data.en: What are the disadvantages of travelling, in your opinion?

data.cy: Sut dych chi'n hoffi teithio?
data.en: How do you like to travel?

data.cy: Dych chi'n cymryd cawod yn y bore neu'r nos?
data.en: Do you take a shower in the morning or evening?

data.cy: Pryd dych chi'n mynd i'r gwely?
data.en: When do you go to bed?

data.cy: Dych chi'n gwylio'r newyddion bob dydd?
data.en: Do you watch the news every day?

data.cy: Beth yw'r peth cyntaf dych chi'n wneud yn y bore?
data.en: What's the first thing you do in the morning?

data.cy: Beth dych chi'n wneud ar ôl yr ysgol/gwaith?
data.en: What do you do after school/work?

data.cy: Dych chi'n gwneud ymarfer corff yn rheolaidd?
data.en: Do you exercise regularly?

data.cy: Pryd dych chi'n codi yn y bore?
data.en: When do you get up in the morning?

data.cy: Beth dych chi'n fwyta i frecwast?
data.en: What do you eat for breakfast?

data.cy: Ydych chi fel arfer yn prynu cinio neu'n dod â chinio o adref?
data.en: Do you usually buy lunch or bring it from home?

data.cy: Sut ydych chi'n teithio i'r ysgol/gwaith?
data.en: How do you travel to school/work?

data.cy: Oes yna rywbeth arbennig dych chi'n ceisio gwneud o leiaf unwaith bob dydd?
data.en: Is there something special you try to do at least once a day?

data.cy: Beth yw eich hoff ran o'r diwrnod, a pham?
data.en: What is your favourite part of the day, and why?

data.cy: Oes well gyda chi cael strwythyr pendant yn y dydd neu'r rhyddid i wneud pethau gwahanol?
data.en: Do you prefer having a specific structure to your day or the freedom to do different things?

data.cy: Sawl person sydd yn eich teulu chi?
data.en: How many people are in your family?

data.cy: Oes gyda chi brodyr neu chwiorydd?
data.en: Do you have any brothers or sisters?

data.cy: Oes anifeiliaid anwes gyda chi?
data.en: Do you have pets?

data.cy: Dych chi'n byw yn agos at eich teulu?
data.en: Do you live close by to your family?

data.cy: Oes nain a thaid gyda chi?
data.en: Do you have grandparents?

data.cy: Pa fath o swydd sydd gyda'ch rhieni?
data.en: What kinds of jobs do your parents have?

data.cy: Pa lysiau dych chi'n hoffi?
data.en: What vegetables do you like?

data.cy: Dych chi'n mynd mas i fwyta yn aml?
data.en: Do you go out to eat often?

data.cy: Ydy bwyta brecwast yn bwysig i chi?
data.en: Is eating breakfast important to you?

data.cy: Dych chi'n bwyta cig?
data.en: Do you eat meat?

data.cy: Dych chi'n hoffi siocled?
data.en: Do you like chocolate?

data.cy: Ydych chi'n yfed coffi? Beth yw eich barn chi amdano?
data.en: Do you drink coffee? What's your opninion on it?

data.cy: Dych chi'n gallu coginio?
data.en: Can you cook?

data.cy: Beth dych chi'n yfed gyda'ch bwyd?
data.en: What do you drink with your food?

data.cy: Beth yw eich hoff fwyd?
data.en: What is your favourite food?

data.cy: Dych chi'n hoffi bwyd â sbeis?
data.en: Do you like spicy food?

data.cy: Beth wyt ydych chi'n cael i frecwast fel arfer?
data.en: What do you usually have for breakfast?

data.cy: Oes well gyda chi coffi, te, neu siocled poeth?
data.en: Do you prefer coffee, tea or hot chocolate?

data.cy: Pa fath o fwyd ydych chi _ddim_ yn hoffi?
data.en: What kind of food do you dislike?

data.cy: Ydych chi'n darllen yn eich amser sbâr?
data.en: Do you read in your spare time?

data.cy: Wyt ti'n chwarae unrhyw chwaraeon?
data.en: Do you play any sports?

data.cy: Beth wyt ti'n hoffi gwneud yn dy amser hamdden?
data.en: What do you like to do in your free time?

data.cy: Dych chi'n hoffi garddio?
data.en: Do you like gardening?

data.cy: Beth dych chi'n gwneud ar y penwythnos?
data.en: What do you do at the weekend?

data.cy: Pa fath o gerddoriaeth dych chi'n hoffi gwrando arno?
data.en: What kind of music do you like?

data.cy: Oes yna hobi hoffech chi ddechrau?
data.en: Is there a hobby you would like to start?

data.cy: Oes hobi arbennig gyda chi?
data.en: Do you have a special hobby?

data.cy: Dych chi'n hoffi coginio?
data.en: Do you like cooking?

data.cy: Pa raglenni teledu dych chi'n hoffi?
data.en: What TV programmes do you like?

data.cy: Dych chi'n mynd i'r sinema'n aml?
data.en: Do you go to the cinema often?

data.cy: Dych chi'n hoffi chwaraeon?
data.en: Do you like sports?

data.cy: Ydych chi'n chwarae offeryn? Os na, oes offeryn hoffech chi allu chwarae?
data.en: Do you play an instrument? If not, is there an instrument you'd like to be able to play?

data.cy: Beth yw eich enw chi?
data.en: What’s your name?

data.cy: O ble dych chi'n dod?
data.en: Where do you come from?

data.cy: Sut byddech chi'n disgrifio'ch hun mewn 3 gair?
data.en: How would you describe yourself in 3 words?

data.cy: Faint yw eich oed chi?
data.en: How old are you?

data.cy: Ble dych chi'n byw?
data.en: Where do you live?

data.cy: Beth yw eich gwaith chi?
data.en: What is your job?

data.cy: Pam ydych chi'n dysgu Cymraeg?
data.en: Why are you learning Welsh?

data.cy: Oes unrhyw sgiliau arbennig gyda chi?
data.en: Do you have any special skills?

data.cy: Beth yw eich arwydd sidydd (zodiac sign)?
data.en: What is your zodiac sign?

data.cy: Pryd mae eich pen-blwydd?
data.en: When is your birthday?

data.cy: Am faint o'r gloch ydych chi'n codi yn y bore?
data.en: When do you wake up in the morning?

data.cy: Am faint o'r gloch ydych chi'n cael swper fel arfer?
data.en: When do you usually have dinner/supper?

data.cy: Pa oed fyddwch chi flwyddyn nesaf?
data.en: What age will you be next year?

data.cy: Pa rif yw eich ffefryn?
data.en: What number is your favourite?

data.cy: Beth ydy hanner pedwar deg?
data.en: What is half of forty?

data.cy: Faint o funudau sydd mewn dwy awr?
data.en: How many minutes are in two hours?

data.cy: Beth yw'r flwyddyn eleni?
data.en: What year is it?

data.cy: Beth yw 25% fel ffracsiwn?
data.en: What is 25% as a fraction??

data.cy: Faint yw dau ddeg lluosi pump?
data.en: What is twenty times five?

data.cy: Beth yw pump deg dau wedi'i adio at saith deg naw?
data.en: What is fifty-two added to seventy-nine?

data.cy: Beth yw'r dyddiad heddiw?
data.en: What is the date today?

data.cy: Os mae afal ar werth am bump deg ceiniog yr un, faint byddai'n costio i brynu deg ohonyn nhw?
data.en: If an apple is on sale for 50p each, how much would it cost to buy ten of them?

data.cy: Elli di gyfri o un i ddeg?
data.en: Can you count from one to ten?

data.cy: Oes siop lyfrau yn dy dref?
data.en: Is there a bookshop in your town?

data.cy: Ble yw'r lle agosaf lle gallwn i brynu bara?
data.en: Where is the closest place I could buy bread?

data.cy: Ydy'r post yn agos?
data.en: Is the post office near?

data.cy: Oes sinema yn y dref?
data.en: Is there a cinema in town?

data.cy: Ble mae'r orsaf drenau?
data.en: Where is the train station?

data.cy: Dych chi'n gwybod ble mae'r llyfrgell?
data.en: Do you know where the library is?

data.cy: Ble mae'r banc?
data.en: Where is the bank?

data.cy: Pa mor bell yw'r ganolfan siopa?
data.en: How far is the shopping centre?

data.cy: Ble mae’r siop fwyaf?
data.en: Where is the biggest shop?

data.cy: Wyt ti’n hoffi mynd i’r parc?
data.en: Do you go like going to the park?

data.cy: Oes caffi da yma?
data.en: Is there a good café here?

data.cy: Sut mae'r tywydd fel arfer ble rydych chi'n byw?
data.en: What's the weather usually like where you live?

data.cy: Oes well gyda ti byw ble mae'n boeth neu ble mae'n oer?
data.en: Do you prefer living somewhere hot or somewhere cold?

data.cy: Sut mae'r tywydd heddiw yn eich ardal chi?
data.en: How's the weather today where you are?

data.cy: Pryd mae hi'n bwrw glaw fel arfer?
data.en: When does it usually rain?

data.cy: Ydych chi'n hoffi mynd unrhywle yn arbennig pan mae'n heulog?
data.en: Do you like going anywhere in particular when it's sunny??

data.cy: Pa fath o dywydd dych chi'n hoffi mwyaf?
data.en: What kind of weather do you like the most?

data.cy: Beth ydych chi'n hoffi gwneud pan mae'n bwrw glaw?
data.en: What do you like to do when it's raining?

data.cy: Beth ydych chi'n hoffi gwneud pan mae'n bwrw eira?
data.en: What do you like to do when it's snowing?

data.cy: Ydych chi erioed wedi bod mewn sefyllfa o dywydd eithafol (extreme weather), fel mewn storm neu lifog (flood)?
data.en: Have you ever been in a situation with extreme weather, like in a storm or flood?

data.cy: Pa dymor yw dy ffefryn: gaeaf, gwanwyn, haf, neu hydref?
data.en: Which is your favourite season: winter, spring, summer or autumn?
